Class ClientNetworkOutcoming

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.client.networkmanager.ClientNetworkOutcoming
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewObserver, java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientNetworkOutcoming
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ViewObserver
Handles message send to the server

    • handleServerConnection

      public void handleServerConnection() throws java.io.IOException
      Sends all messages contained in the queue. Waits for new messages to be sent if the queue is empty. If shutdownThread is true, the thread ends.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's something wrong with the connection
